text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL63 8RCS-054 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG!
